agentAbility.name: Fireworks
agentAbility.description: Ember calls in an APS Turret drop at a designated location, then rushes to her allies with Haste as the turret intercepts incoming shells.

primaryAttack.name: Single Shot
primaryAttack.description: Requires reload after each shot, most accurate when stationary.

tankAbilities.name: Spike
tankAbilities.description: Explosive charges behind the shield armor explode, launching shrapnel in all directions around the vehicle.

tankAbilities.name: Titan Shell
tankAbilities.description: Titan braces for impact and hardens his shields. His shields block all damage at the expense of vehicle mobility. Once the shields have been destroyed, his armor is still exposed.
